languages.text: "По уставу за убийство старшего офицера полагается казнь. Но, учитывая заслуги леди Кибеллы и ее... особый статус, я не смею действовать без вашего дозволения. Леди Кибелла под стражей ожидает вашего суда. Дайте мне знать, когда будете готовы разобрать ее дело".
languages.translation_comment: ! С этого момента и до окончания ивента "Трибунал" Кибелла исчезает из ростера игрока и с капитанского мостика.

traits.locale_text: "По уставу за убийство старшего офицера полагается немедленная казнь, но, учитывая предыдущие заслуги Кибеллы перед династией, мы не смели действовать без вашего приказа. В конце концов, обвиняемая входит в круг приближенных лиц Вашей Светлости. Дайте знать, когда будете готовы вершить суд над предательницей. А до тех пор культистка останется под стражей блюстителей".

languages.translation_comment: ! С этого момента и до окончания ивента "Трибунал" Кибелла исчезает из ростера игрока и с капитанского мостика.

languages.text: "The penalty for murdering a senior officer is death. However, given Mistress Kibellah's honourable service and her... special status, I dare not proceed without your permission. She is incarcerated and awaiting your judgement. Let me know when you are ready to hear her case."
languages.original_text: "По уставу за убийство старшего офицера полагается казнь. Но, учитывая заслуги леди Кибеллы и ее... особый статус, я не смею действовать без вашего дозволения. Леди Кибелла под стражей ожидает вашего суда. Дайте мне знать, когда будете готовы разобрать ее дело".

traits.locale_text: "Death is the prescribed penalty for murdering a senior officer. However, in view of Lady Kibellah's honourable service and her... special status, I dare not proceed without your permission. Lady Kibellah is incarcerated and awaiting your judgment. Let me know when you're ready to hear her case."

"Death is the prescribed penalty for murdering a senior officer. However, in view of Lady Kibellah's honourable service and her... special status, I dare not proceed without your permission. Lady Kibellah is incarcerated and awaiting your judgment. Let me know when you're ready to hear her case."

"The penalty for murdering a senior officer is death. However, given Mistress Kibellah's honourable service and her... special status, I dare not proceed without your permission. Mistress Kibellah is incarcerated and awaiting your judgment. Let me know when you are ready to hear her case."

"The penalty for murdering a senior officer is death. However, given Mistress Kibellah's honourable service and her... special status, I dare not proceed without your permission. Mistress Kibellah is incarcerated and awaiting your judgment. Let me know when you are ready to hear her case."

"The penalty for murdering a senior officer is death. However, given Mistress Kibellah's honourable service and her... special status, I dare not proceed without your permission. She is incarcerated and awaiting your judgement. Let me know when you are ready to hear her case."

"The penalty for murdering a senior officer is death. However, given Mistress Kibellah's honourable service and her... special status, I dare not proceed without your permission. She is incarcerated and awaiting your judgement. Let me know when you are ready to hear her case."

languages.text: « La peine encourue pour le meurtre d'un officier supérieur est la mort. Cela dit, considérant les services rendus par maîtresse Kibellah et son... statut, je n'ai pas osé procéder à l'exécution sans votre permission. Elle est écrouée en attendant votre jugement. Prévenez-moi lorsque vous serez {mf|prêt|prête} à entendre son cas. »
languages.original_text: "The penalty for murdering a senior officer is death. However, given Mistress Kibellah's honourable service and her... special status, I dare not proceed without your permission. She is incarcerated and awaiting your judgement. Let me know when you are ready to hear her case."

traits.locale_text: « La peine encourue pour le meurtre d'un officier supérieur est la mort. Cela dit, considérant les services rendus par maîtresse Kibellah et son... statut, je n'ai pas osé procéder à l'exécution sans votre permission. Elle est écrouée en attendant votre jugement. Prévenez-moi lorsque vous serez {mf|prêt|prête} à entendre son cas. »

languages.text: «La pena por matar a un oficial de alto rango es la muerte. Sin embargo, dado el honorable servicio de la maestra Kibellah y su... particular estatus, no me atrevo a actuar sin su permiso. Está encarcelada y espera su veredicto. Avíseme en cuanto quiera escuchar el caso».
languages.original_text: "The penalty for murdering a senior officer is death. However, given Mistress Kibellah's honourable service and her... special status, I dare not proceed without your permission. She is incarcerated and awaiting your judgement. Let me know when you are ready to hear her case."

traits.locale_text: «La pena por matar a un oficial de alto rango es la muerte. Sin embargo, dado el honorable servicio de la maestra Kibellah y su... particular estatus, no me atrevo a actuar sin su permiso. Está encarcelada y espera su veredicto. Avíseme en cuanto quiera escuchar el caso».

languages.text: 「上級士官殺害の罰は死刑です。ですが、キベラ氏の素晴らしい働きぶり…そして特別な立場を考えると、陛下の許可なしに進めることはできません。彼女は投獄中であなた様のご判断を待っています。彼女の話を聞く準備ができましたらお知らせください」
languages.original_text: "The penalty for murdering a senior officer is death. However, given Mistress Kibellah's honourable service and her... special status, I dare not proceed without your permission. She is incarcerated and awaiting your judgement. Let me know when you are ready to hear her case."

traits.locale_text: 「上級士官殺害の罰は死刑です。ですが、キベラ氏の素晴らしい働きぶり…そして特別な立場を考えると、陛下の許可なしに進めることはできません。彼女は投獄中であなた様のご判断を待っています。彼女の話を聞く準備ができましたらお知らせください」

languages.text: “谋杀高阶军官应当判处死刑。不过，鉴于绮贝菈女士一直以来的表现都非常值得尊重，再考虑到她的……特殊身份，若是没有您的允许，我断不敢妄自行动。我们把她关起来了，等待您的判决。您什么时候愿意审理她的案子，只要和我说一声就好。”
languages.original_text: "The penalty for murdering a senior officer is death. However, given Mistress Kibellah's honourable service and her... special status, I dare not proceed without your permission. She is incarcerated and awaiting your judgement. Let me know when you are ready to hear her case."

traits.locale_text: “谋杀高阶军官应当判处死刑。不过，鉴于绮贝菈女士一直以来的表现都非常值得尊重，再考虑到她的……特殊身份，若是没有您的允许，我断不敢妄自行动。我们把她关起来了，等待您的判决。您什么时候愿意审理她的案子，只要和我说一声就好。”

languages.text: "Auf den Mord an einem leitenden Offizier steht die Todesstrafe. Doch angesichts von Herrin Kibellahs ehrenhaften Diensten und ihres ... besonderen Status wage ich nicht, ohne Eure Erlaubnis fortzufahren. Sie sitzt in Haft und wartet auf Euer Urteil. Lasst mich wissen, wenn Ihr bereit seid, Euch ihren Fall anzuhören."
languages.original_text: "The penalty for murdering a senior officer is death. However, given Mistress Kibellah's honourable service and her... special status, I dare not proceed without your permission. She is incarcerated and awaiting your judgement. Let me know when you are ready to hear her case."

traits.locale_text: "Auf den Mord an einem leitenden Offizier steht die Todesstrafe. Doch angesichts von Herrin Kibellahs ehrenhaften Diensten und ihres ... besonderen Status wage ich nicht, ohne Eure Erlaubnis fortzufahren. Sie sitzt in Haft und wartet auf Euer Urteil. Lasst mich wissen, wenn Ihr bereit seid, Euch ihren Fall anzuhören."

languages.text: "Kıdemli bir subayı öldürmenin cezası ölümdür. Fakat Kibellah Hanım'ın onurlu hizmeti ve... Özel konumu göz önünde bulundurulduğunda izniniz olmadan herhangi bir işlem yapmaya cüret edemem. Şu anda gözetimde tutuluyor ve hükmünüzü bekliyor. Hikâyesini dinlemeye hazır olduğunuzda bana haber verin."
languages.original_text: "The penalty for murdering a senior officer is death. However, given Mistress Kibellah's honourable service and her... special status, I dare not proceed without your permission. She is incarcerated and awaiting your judgement. Let me know when you are ready to hear her case."
